flawed_nl_solution:
Oscar needs to increase his maximum running time from 20 - 2 = <<20-2=81>>81 miles.
Oscar will need a total of 81 / ( 2/3 ) = <<81/(2/3)=243/2>>243/2 weeks to prepare.
#### 243/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
